%for order in objects: %if 'General' in order.partner_id.category_id.name: <%page expression_filter="entity"/> <% def carriage_returns(text): return text.replace('\n', '
') %> <%def name="address(partner)"> <%doc> XXX add a helper for address in report_webkit module as this won't be suported in v8.0 %if partner.parent_id: ${partner.parent_id.name or ''} ${partner.title and partner.title.name or ''} ${partner.name} ${partner.parent_id.website} <% address_lines = partner.contact_address.split("\n")[1:] %> %else: ${partner.title and partner.title.name or ''} ${partner.name} <% address_lines = partner.contact_address.split("\n") %> ${partner.state_id.name} %endif %for order in objects: <% setLang(order.partner_id.lang) %> <% quotation = order.state in ['draft', 'sent'] %> %endfor

${_('Payment Term')}: ${order.partner_id.property_payment_term.name}

%for inv in objects: %if 'General' in inv.partner_id.category_id.name: <%page expression_filter="entity"/> <% def carriage_returns(text): return text.replace('\n', '
') %> <%def name="address(partner, commercial_partner=None)"> <%doc> XXX add a helper for address in report_webkit module as this won't be suported in v8.0 <% company_partner = False %> %if commercial_partner: %if commercial_partner.id != partner.id: <% company_partner = commercial_partner %> %endif %elif partner.parent_id: <% company_partner = partner.parent_id %> %endif %if company_partner: ${company_partner.name or ''} ${partner.title and partner.title.name or ''} ${partner.name} <% address_lines = partner.contact_address.split("\n")[1:] %> %else: ${partner.title and partner.title.name or ''} ${partner.name} <% address_lines = partner.contact_address.split("\n") %> %endif %for part in address_lines: % if part: ${part} % endif %endfor %for inv in objects: <% setLang(inv.partner_id.lang) %> %endfor
%if hasattr(inv, 'commercial_partner_id'): ${address(partner=inv.partner_id, commercial_partner=inv.commercial_partner_id)} %else: ${address(partner=inv.partner_id)} %endif
%if inv.type == 'out_invoice' and inv.state == 'proforma2': ${_("PRO-FORMA")} %elif inv.type == 'out_invoice' and inv.state == 'draft': ${_("Draft Invoice")} %elif inv.type == 'out_invoice' and inv.state == 'cancel': ${_("Cancelled Invoice")} ${inv.number or ''} %elif inv.type == 'out_invoice': ${_("Invoice")} ${inv.number or ''} %elif inv.type == 'in_invoice': ${_("Supplier Invoice")} ${inv.number or ''} %elif inv.type == 'out_refund': ${_("Refund")} ${inv.number or ''} %elif inv.type == 'in_refund': ${_("Supplier Refund")} ${inv.number or ''} %endif
${helper.embed_logo_by_name('Motoscoot')|n}
Dirección Factura
${inv.partner_id.name}
DNI/CIF: ${inv.partner_id.vat}
${inv.partner_id.street}
${inv.partner_id.country_id.name}

Dirección Envio
${inv.partner_id.name}
${inv.partner_id.street}
${inv.partner_id.country_id.name}

${_("Subject : ")} ${inv.name or ''}: ${inv.name}  Fecha: ${inv.date_invoice}
${_('Payment Type')}: ${inv.payment_type.name}
${_('Payment Term')}: ${inv.partner_id.property_payment_term.name}
${_("Comercial")}: ${inv.user_id.name}

Noticias cliente

NIF ${inv.company_id.partner_id.vat}
